articles.title: IIFL Finance Q4 | Profit falls 6% to ₹431 crore - CNBCTV18
articles.description: IIFL Finance's consolidated net profit declined by 6% to ₹431 crore in the March quarter due to RBI's ban on gold loan operations. Despite this, total income increased to ₹2,922 crore. Gross NPAs rose to 2.3%, and CRAR stood at 19.7% exceeding the regulatory …
